page.title: 16GROSMONT GAMES 1
page.content: The next pages tell you where and what games the children of Grosmont play in 1985.They are the games played by children from 7_11 years of age. Because Grosmont has some old buildings it makes a good place to play around. {Aimi says her favourite place to {play is :_ } ".....in the churchyard,because there is a lovely view,it is quiet and I play with Rex and Scotty the farm dogs.Sometimes I throw a ball and Rex gets it.It is a really lovely place to look at birds and play. { Meyrick says his favourite place {to play is :_ } ".....in the castle.One reason is that it is big,you can play lots of different games there.The two games I play most with my friends are 40-40
